title: please help me
body: I was hacked and i am from a country that the supports cannot connect to because they stated on the website that my country cannot access some functions. That person keeps sending links to my contacts causing them to get hacked and i have no idea what to do.

replies.body: I'm not aware of any restrictions that would prevent access to the support site, but you can also email us via support@riotgames.com.  In the meantime, I recommend using our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) if it's accessible for you to try and recover your account.  Otherwise, our account team will respond to your email as soon as possible!
Thank you but it seems that they just blocked my support website and i found the resolve.
